notes: The story was inspired by Wilfred Gibson's 1912 poem Flannan Isle.
The story was a replacement for another script titled The Vampire Mutations.
Leela's eye color change was a practical decision to remove the need for contact lenses.
All characters other than the Doctor and Leela were killed off in the story.

continuity_notes: The Rutans were previously mentioned as the Sontarans' adversaries.
Leela has blue eyes following this story.

plot.plot_summary: The Doctor and Leela arrive at the isolated lighthouse on Fang Rock. Mysterious events ensue as a light falls from the sky, a green glow emerges from the ocean, and all manner of power fluctuations occur. After one of the lighthouse keepers is found dead, the Doctor investigates. He discovers that a Rutan scout, an alien and enemy of the Sontarans, has taken the form of the deceased Reuben and is sabotaging the lighthouse to fend off humans while summoning reinforcements. After a series of deaths, the Doctor and Leela manage to defeat the creature by weaponizing the lighthouse's lamp into a laser, destroying the approaching Rutan ship.
